definitions.text: make politically neutral and thus inoffensive
examples: The treaty neutralized the small republic

definitions.text: make ineffective by counterbalancing the effect of
examples: This action will negate the effect of my efforts

definitions.text: oppose and mitigate the effects of by contrary actions
examples: This will counteract the foolish actions of my colleagues

definitions.text: get rid of (someone who may be a threat) by killing
